sentences.en: a belief in the primacy of the family
According to st Paul, in marriage there is a primacy of man. what kind?
sentences.cn: 根据圣保罗的说法,男人在婚姻当中居首位, 此为何意?

sentences.en: By all accounts , including his own, Bush puts great stock in the primacy of personal relationships.
sentences.cn: 据各方面报道,也由布什本人承认, 他在这里面投入了重要的个人关系.

sentences.en: Company to a people - oriented, customer primacy, unity, cooperation, innovation and realistic approach to quality.
sentences.cn: 公司以“以人为本 、 顾客至上 、 团结协作 、 求实创新”为质量方针.

sentences.en: First, the primacy of class must be promoted as an antidote to individualism.
sentences.cn: 首先, 阶级作为首位意识必须被提升为个人主义的解毒剂.

sentences.en: He was too proud of the primacy of his intelligence to listen.
sentences.cn: 他太自负,以其智力过人而不好好听.

sentences.en: In both it is impossible to deny the primacy of inner, invisible processes.
sentences.cn: 在这两种场合下,我们都不可能否认内在的 、 隐蔽的过程的首要地位.

sentences.en: It is certainly shared by those consultancies that emphasise the primacy of action over analysis.
sentences.cn: 那些强调行动比分析重要的咨询机构当然是认同的.

sentences.en: Mr. Geithner took the remarks seriously enough that he publicly reaffirmed the primacy of the dollar.
sentences.cn: 盖特纳先生非常谨慎的做出评论,他公开重申美元的首要地位.

sentences.en: Take advantage of the primacy - recency effect.
The political idea at the heart of this is the primacy of the individual.
sentences.cn: 其核心的政治观点就是把个人放在首位。

sentences.en: The Primacy of Genes also assumes that genes act on their own.
sentences.cn: 基因至上论还认为基因可以自发作用.

sentences.en: The primacy of the deed is over word and thought.
UK - based etiquette expert Rachel Holland is a firm believer in the primacy of the handshake.
sentences.cn: 英国礼仪专家瑞切尔?霍兰德(RachelHolland)坚持认为,握手是最首要的礼节.

sentences.en: We must give primacy to education.
What does such an apparent reversal of the norm of male primacy stand for?
sentences.cn: 如此明显地与男性优势的常态相对反,意味著什 麽 ?

words.tran_cn: 大主教；灵长类的动物；首领
首位；卓越；大主教的职位

trans.tran_cn: 首位，第一位，卓越，（英国教会）大主教的职务
trans.tran_en: if someone or something has primacy, they are the best or most important person or thing
